title: Sri Maa in Vrindavan
description: Maa during her blessed visit to the holy land of Vrindavan, where Lord Krishna performed his divine leelas.
caption: Divine presence in the land of Krishna

title: Kankhal Samadhi Shrine
description: The sacred Samadhi shrine at Kankhal where Maa's mortal body was laid to rest. A place of deep peace and divine presence.

title: Maa in Deep Meditation
description: A rare photograph capturing Maa in the state of samadhi, radiating divine bliss and peace.
caption: The embodiment of Ananda

title: Maa with Devotees
description: Maa surrounded by loving devotees during a satsang. Her divine smile blessing all present.

title: Kanyapeeth Dehradun
description: The beautiful campus of Shree Shree Anandamayee Kanyapeeth in Dehradun, educating young girls in both modern and spiritual knowledge.

title: Maa at Kashi
description: Maa in the ancient holy city of Kashi (Varanasi), one of her favorite places for spiritual work.
